name: Lost & Found Agency Collector's Edition
description:
Play this great new hidden objecft game from AVI Games. Get and fullfill orders from the detective agency “Lost & Found Agency” to search for missing objects and go to fascinating locations full of riddles and mysteries. Explore dangerous places, decipher clues and uncover the secrets leading to the solution. Find the missing objects and solve the crime, confirming your abilities and intuition.

This is a Collector's Edition filled with exclusive bonuses that you won't find in the standard version.

* The Collector's Edition includes:
* 8 additional locations with lots of objects!
* 8 additional minigames!
* And 12 additional minigames for puzzle lovers!
* Downloadable wallpapers!
* The opportunity to listen to soundtracks!
* Add the found objects to your storage!
